description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4f919","text":"This protocol is used to isolate mitochondria from cells. Isolated mitochondria can then be further analyzed, as described here, with a complex I enzyme activity assay, and/or blue native PAGE to quantify amounts of complex subunits.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4qpk","text":"Mitochondria Isolation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4nd","text":"EGTA (Sigma, #E4378)  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53ogq","text":"KOH (Sigma, CAS #1310-58-3) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbv3s","text":"Sucrose (Sigma, #S0389) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r4rl","text":"Tris-HCl (Thermo Fisher,  #NC9348850)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq7eq","text":"Mannitol (Sigma, #M4125)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ibe2","text":"Sucrose (Sigma, #S0389)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47j21","text":"HEPES pH 7.4 (UCSF Media Core, CCFGL002)
","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"as6fu","text":"Complex I Activity Assay","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8lpf","text":"200 mM KCN (Sigma, # 60178; MW 65.12)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d870h","text":"500 mM MgCl2 (Sigma, #M8266-100G)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55cal","text":"100 mg/mL BSA  (Sigma, #A7030)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ihvh","text":"65 mM decylubiquinone (Sigma, #D7911; MW 322.44)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3b0pp","text":"15 mM K2NADH (Sigma, #N4505; MW 741.6)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":7,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5584","text":"1 mM Antimycin A (Sigma, #A8674; MW 548.63)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h91q","text":"0.5 mM (Sigma, #R8875; MW 394.4)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v2g9","text":"Spectrophometer for enzyme activity assay: Spectramax M4 platereader
","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0gl4","text":"Blue Native Page Gel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"216gq","text":"Pierce‱Coomassie Brilliant Blue Dyes (ThermoFisher, #20279)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2sg4n","text":"Nativepage 4x Sample Buffer (ThermoFisher, #BN2003)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4si8n","text":"Nativepage 5% G250 (ThermoFisher, #BN2004)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e4ju","text":"NativePAGE‱Running Buffer (20X) (ThermoFisher, #BN2001)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ahj7","text":"Nativepage 3-12% Gels (ThermoFisher, #BN1001)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqfhi","text":"Total OXPHOS human western blot antibody cocktail (abcam, #ab110411)
","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5frhu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6F2F9ED1663111EE9EF90A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6F2F9ED1663111EE9EF90A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"75f3n","text":"Jha P, Wang X, Auwerx J. Analysis of Mitochondrial Respiratory Chain Supercomplexes Using Blue Native Polyacrylamide Gel Electrophoresis (BN-PAGE). Curr Protoc Mouse Biol. 2016 Mar 1;6(1):1-14. doi: 10.1002/9780470942390.mo150182. PMID: 26928661; PMCID: PMC4823378.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"emjlh","text":"Make mitochondrial isolation buffers - starting buffer, mitochondrial resuspension buffer.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ujkp","text":"100 mM EGTA, pH 7.4:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh6fb","text":"3.8 g EGTA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2gr1","text":"70 mL water ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vpqm","text":"Adjusted pH KOH","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4acq5","text":"Bring to 100 mL with water\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"di51i","text":"Starting Buffer (225 mM mannitol, 75 mM sucrose, 30 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sjjt","text":"20.5 g mannitol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e213e","text":"13 g sucrose ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qj3g","text":"400 mL water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah069","text":"15 mL Tris-HCl (1 M, pH 7.4)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vf9t","text":"Adjust pH to 7.4, and ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1shb7","text":"Bring to 500 mL with water\n\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1dm19","text":"Mitochondrial Resuspension Buffer (250 mM mannitol, 5 mM HEPES pH 7.4, 0.5 mM EGTA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a44jk","text":"4.56 g mannitol ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88v78","text":"80 mL water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"160c","text":"1 mL 0.5M HEPES pH 7.4","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5ae5","text":"Allow to cool","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"307ds","text":"Adjust pH to 7.4","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i0b","text":"Bring to 100 mL with water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bk54e","text":"Spin down 50 million cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5vh7t","text":"Resuspend cells in 5 mL PBS to wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bcu7a","text":"Spin down to create a cell pellet at 600 g for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6trlq","text":"Aspirate out the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15el1","text":"Resuspend cells in 5 mL of PBS and spin down once more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3oto","text":"Aspirate off the PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30for","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 1 mL of starting buffer and 100 mM EGTA (pH 7.4).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9of6u","text":"Split the cell solution into 2 chilled 2 mL tubes each containing half the cell solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"900tc","text":"Homogenize the cells using a tissue grinder for 200-250 strokes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5dklo","text":"Transfer the homogenate to new chilled centrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f9aq8","text":"Centrifuge for 5 minutes at 600 g at 4˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"39fgk","text":"Resuspend the pellet containing mitochondria in starting buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"14nss","text":"Centrifuge for 10 minutes at 7000 g at 4˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dsodh","text":"Discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fk70g","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 1.6 mL starting buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fn5qk","text":"Centrifuge for 10 minutes at 10000 g at 4˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7n0rt","text":"Discard supernatant. Resuspend the pellet in 2 mL MRB buffer (mitochondria pellet).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eun1p","text":"Snap freeze samples by putting them on dry ice and spraying the ice down with 70% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mka6","text":"Store samples at -80˚C for further assays (i.e. enzyme activity assay, blue native PAGE).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hug1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnigu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3q5rq","text":"Make master mix with or without rotenone:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rg4i","text":"100 mM KPhos buffer pH 7.4 (make fresh monthly; store at 4°C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u1e","text":"200 mM KCN  (make fresh daily; 0.0130 g/1 mL 1M KPhos buffer pH 7.0) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c0pe","text":"500 mM MgCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o271","text":"100 mg/mL BSA ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ubi8","text":"65 mM (21 mg/mL) decylubiquinone: Dissolve 10 mg of decylubiquinone in 0.476 mL ethanol to make a 65 mM (21 mg/mL) stock for long-term storage at -20°C.  On the day of the experiment, dilute 16 mL of 65 mM stock into 84 mL ethanol for a 100 mL working stock of ~10 mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0lf4","text":"15 mM K2NADH  (make fresh daily; light sensitive; 0.0115 g/1 mL ddH2O) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":7,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":67,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":16},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":33,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pcon","text":"1 mM Antimycin A  (store at -20°C; 5.486 mg/10 mL 200 proof EtOH) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rqij","text":"0.5 mM Rotenone (store at -20°C; light sensitive; 5.916 mg/30 mL 200 proof EtOH)\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":33,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3j4nd","text":"Only use ddH2O in this assay, as enzyme activity is affected by presence of detergent.\n","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edv7p","text":"Dispense 100 µL of master mix into designated wells of a 96 well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4grvp","text":"Set spectrophometer (Spectramax M4 platereader) to read 340 nm wavelength for 5 min at constant 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at2ml","text":"QUICKLY dispense 10 µg of crude mitochondria preps into each master mix well (minimize time here!).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9sf75","text":"Record reading on spectrophotometer for 45 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pf7h","text":"Prepare 20 µl sample buffer cocktail for every 50 µg crude mitochondria prep:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63dhp","text":"5 μl of NativePAGE sample buffer (4×), 8 μl of 5% digitonin, and 7 μl of water for a 8g/g digitonin to protein ratio.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ti7","text":"For dark blue cathode buffer, dissolve 0.044 g Coomassie Brilliant Blue G-250 in 220 ml of Native PAGE anode buffer, mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd9tn","text":"For light blue cathode buffer, add 20 ml of dark blue cathode buffer into 180ml of native PAGE anode buffer, mix well. The buffer can only be used once.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9mub","text":"Solubilize mitochondria by adding 20 µl sample buffer cocktail to 50 µg crude mitochondria prep and gently mix with a P20 pipette. Make sure to avoid formation of bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"33iap","text":"Incubate solubilized mitochondria on ice for 20 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5nkqe","text":"Centrifuge at 20,000 × g for 10 min at 4°C and then collect 15 μl of the supernatant into new tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"252n0","text":"Add 2 μl of Coomassie G-250 sample additive to the above supernatant. The G-250 volume should be such that the final G-250 concentration is 1/4th the detergent concentration. This step should be done just before loading the samples into the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9386p","text":"Set up the electrophoresis system (XCell SureLock Mini-Cell): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hpdr","text":"Remove the white tape on the bottom of a NativePAGE 3-12% gradient gel and place it in the apparatus.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f32qn","text":"Wash the wells of the gel with 1 ml of dark blue cathode buffer. Put 20 ml of dark blue cathode buffer in the inner chamber and check for leakage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3bivm","text":"Load 15 μl of sample into the gel by using Prot/Elec Tips. Fill the inner chamber with about 180 ml of dark blue cathode buffer, and then fill the outside chamber with about 600 ml of running buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avbho","text":"Carefully add the dark blue cathode buffer without disturbing the samples in wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8q9ni","text":"Turn on the power supply and run the gel at 150 V for 30 min. Remove the dark blue buffer with a 10-ml size pipette or suction tube and fill the inner chamber with 200 ml of light blue buffer. Run the gel at 250 V for 60 min. If better separation of the bands is desired then the gel can be run for maximum of 150 min at 250 V. A longer run time than 150 min has minimal impact on the separation and resolution of bands.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae5kf","text":"To transfer the BN-PAGE gel, first take the gel out of the cassette and wash it with water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q4ns","text":"Incubate the gel in transfer buffer for 15 min with gentle shaking, before transferring gel to PVDF membrane using an iBlot Gel Transfer Device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m9mg","text":"Block and stain PVDF membrane with total OXPHOS human western blot antibody cocktail at 1:500 concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ob6l","text":"Visualize blots with an Odyssey infrared imaging system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed2i5","text":"Analyze blots with Image Studio Lite Software from Li-cor Biosciences.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Isolated Mitochondria Characterization
